title: r-wbids Project Reference
text: List issues: gh issue list View issue details: gh issue view 80 (e.g., issue #80 “Rename geographies parameter”) Create branch issue: gh issue develop 80 Checkout branch: git checkout 80-rename-geographies-parameter--entities Create pull request: gh pr create --title "Rename geographies parameter entities" --body "Implements #80" List pull requests: gh pr list View pull request: gh pr view PR_NUMBER

title: r-wbids Project Reference
text: Build package: R CMD build . Install package: R CMD INSTALL . Run tests: R -e "devtools::test()" Run single test: R -e "devtools::test_file('tests/testthat/test-FILE_NAME.R', reporter = 'progress')" Run R CMD check: R -e "devtools::check()" Build Roxygen2 documentation: R -e "devtools::document()" Build vignettes: R -e "devtools::build_vignettes()" Build README.md README.Rmd: R -e "devtools::build_readme()"

title: r-wbids Project Reference
text: Use 2 spaces indentation (tabs) Maximum 80 characters per line Use tidyverse style R code (dplyr, tidyr, purrr) Export functions explicit @export roxygen tag Use snake_case function variable names Prefer implicit returns (last expression returned) Validate function inputs specific validation functions Use expect_ functions test assertions Document exported functions roxygen2 comments (markdown) Include parameter type validation beginning functions Follow tidyverse error handling patterns informative messages

title: wbids Data Model
text: diagram shows data model wbids package. design, primarily R users mind, particularly rely heavily popular data manipulation packages dplyr data.table. users, consistent descriptive primary key column names across different tables (e.g., entity_id, series_id) simplifies writing joins across tables, reduces risk column name conflicts, avoids ambiguity. hence deliberately deviate common practice data modeling omit entity prefix entity table (e.g. entity_ entities table).
code: erDiagram     ENTITIES ||--o{ DEBT_STATISTICS : has     ENTITIES {         string entity_id PK         string entity_name         string entity_iso2code         string entity_type         string capital_city         string region_id         string region_iso2code         string region_name         string admin_region_id         string admin_region_iso2code         string admin_region_name         string lending_type_id         string lending_type_iso2code         string lending_type_name     }     SERIES ||--o{ DEBT_STATISTICS : has     SERIES ||--o{ SERIES_TOPICS : has     SERIES {         string series_id PK         string series_name         int source_id         string source_note         string source_organization     }     COUNTERPARTS ||--o{ DEBT_STATISTICS : has     COUNTERPARTS {         string counterpart_id PK         string counterpart_name         string counterpart_iso2code         string counterpart_iso3code         string counterpart_type     }     SERIES_TOPICS {         string series_id FK         int topic_id         string topic_name     }     DEBT_STATISTICS {         string series_id FK         string entity_id FK         string counterpart_id FK         int year         float value     }

what: Assignment of Entity and Counterpart Types
title: wbids Data Model
text: original World Bank IDS data includes ‘country’ field, containing countries regions, ‘counterpart-area’ field, may include countries, regions, institutions. data model, fields renamed ‘entity’ ‘counterpart’ clarify types entities column. also introduce corresponding type columns specify whether entity country (e.g., “Aruba”) region (e.g., “Africa Eastern Southern”), whether counterpart country, region, special category (e.g., “Global IFIs”, “Global MDBs”). counterpart represented entity table country region, ensuring consistency across tables.

what: Harmonization of Entity and Counterpart Names
title: wbids Data Model
text: cases, IDS data provides different names entities appear ‘counterpart-area’ ‘country’ data. use entity names whenever available drop counterpart names different wording. instance, original data features “Cote D`Ivoire, Republic ” counterpart table, country name “Cote d’Ivoire”, overwrite former latter.

what: Seamless Access to World Bank International Debt Statistics (IDS)
title: Seamless Access to World Bank International Debt Statistics (IDS)
text: wbids R package access analyze World Bank’s International Debt Statistics (IDS). IDS provides creditor-debtor relationships countries, regions, institutions. ‘wbids’ enables users download, process work IDS series across multiple entities, counterparts, time periods. wbids package relies redefinition original World Bank data: ‘entities’ contain countries regions, ‘counterparts’ include counterpart areas institutions. wbids provides consistent mapping identifiers names across different types. corresponding package vignette provides details data model. package part EconDataverse family packages aimed helping economists financial professionals work sovereign-level economic data. package product Teal Insights sponsored affiliated World Bank way, except use World Bank IDS API.

title: Seamless Access to World Bank International Debt Statistics (IDS)
text: can install wbids CRAN via: can also install development version wbids like : Linux, may need install libcurl4-openssl-dev prerequisite build package.
code: install.packages("wbids") # install.packages("pak") pak::pak("teal-insights/r-wbids")

title: Seamless Access to World Bank International Debt Statistics (IDS)
text: main function ids_get() provides interface download multiple IDS series multiple entities counterparts specific date ranges. package comes prepared metadata available series, entities, counterparts, topics. Please consult package vignette details. data can used enrich IDS series facilitate data discovery. applications, please consult Teal Insights’ Guide Working World Bank International Debt Statistics. interface column names fully consistent World Development Indicators (WDI) data provided wbwdi package. can find details github.com/tidy-intelligence/r-wbwdi.
code: library(wbids)  ids_get(   geographies = c("ZMB", "ZAF"),   series = c("DT.DOD.DPPG.CD", "BM.GSR.TOTL.CD"),   counterparts = c("216", "231"),   start_year = 2015,   end_year = 2020 ) ids_list_series() ids_list_entities() ids_list_counterparts() ids_list_series_topics()

title: Seamless Access to World Bank International Debt Statistics (IDS)
text: Contributions wbids welcome! ’d like contribute, please follow steps: Create issue: making changes, create issue describing bug feature ’re addressing. Fork repository: Fork repository GitHub account. Create branch: Create branch changes descriptive name. Make changes: Implement bug fix feature. Test changes: Run tests ensure changes don’t break existing functionality. Submit pull request: Push changes fork submit pull request main repository. detailed information package structure development process, please visit project Wiki.

title: Seamless Access to World Bank International Debt Statistics (IDS)

code: graph TB     A[wbids] --> B[ids_list_*]     A --> C[ids_get]     A --> D[ids_bulk*]      B --> B1[ids_list_counterparts]     B --> B2[ids_list_entities]     B --> B3[ids_list_series]     B --> B4[ids_list_series_topics]      D --> D1[ids_bulk]     D --> D2[ids_bulk_files]     D --> D3[ids_bulk_series]      classDef default fill:#fff,stroke:#333,color:#333     classDef main fill:#f9f,stroke:#333,color:#000,font-weight:bold     classDef group fill:#bbf,stroke:#333,color:#000      class A main     class B,C,D group     class B1,B2,B3,B4,D1,D2,D3 default

what: Download and Process Bulk Data File for International Debt Statistics — ids_bulk
title: Download and Process Bulk Data File for International Debt Statistics — ids_bulk
text: function downloads data file World Bank International Debt Statistics (IDS), reads processes data tidy format.

title: Download and Process Bulk Data File for International Debt Statistics — ids_bulk
code: ids_bulk(   file_url,   file_path = tempfile(fileext = ".xlsx"),   quiet = FALSE,   timeout = getOption("timeout", 60),   warn_size = TRUE )

title: Download and Process Bulk Data File for International Debt Statistics — ids_bulk
text: file_url character string specifying URL Excel file download. parameter required (see ids_bulk_files). file_path optional character string specifying file path downloaded file saved. Defaults temporary file .xlsx extension. file automatically deleted processing. quiet logical parameter indicating whether messages printed console. timeout integer specifying timeout seconds downloading file. Defaults current R timeout setting. warn_size logical parameter indicating whether warn large downloads. Defaults TRUE.

title: Download and Process Bulk Data File for International Debt Statistics — ids_bulk
text: tibble containing processed debt statistics data following columns: entity_id unique identifier entity (e.g., "ZMB"). series_id unique identifier series (e.g., "DT.DOD.DPPG.CD"). counterpart_id unique identifier counterpart series. year year corresponding data (integer). value numeric value representing statistic given entity, series, counterpart, year.

title: Download and Process Bulk Data File for International Debt Statistics — ids_bulk
code: if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{ available_files <- ids_bulk_files() data <- ids_bulk(   available_files$file_url[1] ) } # }

what: Fetch Data from the World Bank International Debt Statistics (IDS) API — ids_get
title: Fetch Data from the World Bank International Debt Statistics (IDS) API — ids_get
text: Retrieves standardized debt statistics World Bank's International Debt Statistics (IDS) database, provides comprehensive data external debt low middle-income countries. function handles country identification, data validation, unit standardization, making easier conduct cross-country debt analysis monitoring.

title: Fetch Data from the World Bank International Debt Statistics (IDS) API — ids_get
code: ids_get(   entities,   series,   counterparts = "WLD",   start_year = 2000,   end_year = NULL,   progress = FALSE,   geographies = lifecycle::deprecated() )

title: Fetch Data from the World Bank International Debt Statistics (IDS) API — ids_get
text: entities character vector entity identifiers representing debtor countries aggregates. Must use entity_id ids_list_entities: individual countries, use ISO3C codes (e.g., "GHA" Ghana) aggregates, use World Bank codes (e.g., "LIC" low income countries) IDS database covers low middle-income countries related aggregates . contain NA values. series character vector debt statistics series identifiers must match series_id column ids_list_series. series represents specific debt statistic (e.g., "DT.DOD.DECT.CD" total external debt stocks, "DT.TDS.DECT.CD" debt service payments). contain NA values. counterparts character vector creditor identifiers must match counterpart_id column ids_list_counterparts. default "WLD" returns aggregated global totals across creditors. Common options: "WLD" - World total (aggregated across creditors) "" - Retrieve data broken creditors identifiers strings, string-formatted numbers (e.g., "730" China, "907" IMF), others alphabetic codes (e.g., "BND" bondholders) contain NA values. start_year numeric value representing starting year (default: 2000). default intended reduce data volume. historical analysis, explicitly set 1970 (earliest year data available). end_year numeric value representing ending year (default: NULL). Must >= 1970 earlier start_year. NULL, returns data recent available year. debt service-related series include projections debt service. 2024 data release, debt service projections available 2031. progress logical value indicating whether display progress messages data retrieval (default: FALSE). geographies Superseded favor entities. supplied, mapped entities warning. use together entities.

title: Fetch Data from the World Bank International Debt Statistics (IDS) API — ids_get
text: tibble containing debt statistics following columns: entity_id identifier debtor entity (e.g., "GHA" Ghana, "LIC" low income countries) series_id identifier debt statistic series (e.g., "DT.DOD.DECT.CD" total external debt stocks) counterpart_id identifier creditor (e.g., "WLD" world total, "730" China) year year observation value numeric value debt statistic, standardized units specified series definition (typically current US dollars)

title: Fetch Data from the World Bank International Debt Statistics (IDS) API — ids_get
text: IDS database provides detailed debt statistics low middle-income countries, including: Debt stocks flows Debt service interest payments Creditor composition Terms conditions new commitments ensure valid queries: Use ids_list_entities find valid debtor entity codes Use ids_list_series explore available debt statistics Use ids_list_counterparts see available creditor codes

title: Fetch Data from the World Bank International Debt Statistics (IDS) API — ids_get
code: # \donttest{ # Get total external debt stocks for a single country from 2000 onward ghana_debt <- ids_get(   entities = "GHA",   series = "DT.DOD.DECT.CD"  # External debt stocks, total )  # Compare debt service metrics across income groups income_groups <- ids_get(   entities = c("LIC", "LMC", "UMC"),  # Income group aggregates   series = "DT.TDS.DECT.CD",  # Total debt service   start_year = 2010 )  # Analyze debt composition by major creditors creditor_analysis <- ids_get(   entities = c("KEN", "ETH"),  # Kenya and Ethiopia   series = c(     "DT.DOD.DECT.CD",  # Total external debt     "DT.TDS.DECT.CD"   # Total debt service   ),   counterparts = c(     "WLD",  # World total     "730",  # China     "907",  # IMF     "BND"   # Bondholders   ),   start_year = 2015 ) # }

what: List Available Counterparts from the World Bank International Debt Statistics API — ids_list_counterparts
title: List Available Counterparts from the World Bank International Debt Statistics API — ids_list_counterparts
text: function returns tibble available counterparts World Bank International Debt Statistics (IDS) API. row provides details counterparts, including unique identifiers, names, types.

code: ids_list_counterparts()

title: List Available Counterparts from the World Bank International Debt Statistics API — ids_list_counterparts
text: tibble containing available counterparts attributes: counterpart_id unique identifier counterpart (e.g., "730"). counterpart_name standardized name counterpart (e.g., "China"). counterpart_iso2code ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 code counterpart (e.g., "CN"). counterpart_iso3code ISO 3166-1 alpha-3 code counterpart (e.g., "CHN"). counterpart_type type counterpart (e.g., "Country", "Institution", "Region").

title: List Available Counterparts from the World Bank International Debt Statistics API — ids_list_counterparts
code: ids_list_counterparts() #> # A tibble: 303 × 5 #>    counterpart_id counterpart_name counterpart_iso2code counterpart_iso3code #>    <chr>          <chr>            <chr>                <chr>                #>  1 001            Austria          AT                   AUT                  #>  2 002            Belgium          BE                   BEL                  #>  3 003            Denmark          DK                   DNK                  #>  4 004            France           FR                   FRA                  #>  5 005            Germany          DE                   DEU                  #>  6 006            Italy            IT                   ITA                  #>  7 007            Netherlands      NL                   NLD                  #>  8 008            Norway           NO                   NOR                  #>  9 009            Portugal         PT                   PRT                  #> 10 010            Sweden           SE                   SWE                  #> # ℹ 293 more rows #> # ℹ 1 more variable: counterpart_type <chr>

what: List Available Entities from the World Bank International Debt Statistics API — ids_list_entities
title: List Available Entities from the World Bank International Debt Statistics API — ids_list_entities

code: ids_list_entities()

title: List Available Entities from the World Bank International Debt Statistics API — ids_list_entities
text: tibble containing available entities attributes: entity_id ISO 3166-1 alpha-3 code entity (e.g., "ZMB"). entity_name standardized name entity (e.g., "Zambia"). entity_iso2code ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 code entity (e.g., "ZM"). entity_type type entity (e.g., "Country", "Region"). capital_city capital city entity (e.g., "Lusaka"). region_id unique identifier region (e.g., "SSF"). region_iso2code ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 code region (e.g., "ZG"). region_name name region (e.g., "Sub-Saharan Africa"). admin_region_id unique identifier administrative region (e.g., "SSA"). admin_region_iso2code ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 code administrative region (e.g., "ZF"). admin_region_name name administrative region (e.g., "Sub-Saharan Africa (excluding high income)"). lending_type_id unique identifier lending type (e.g., "IDX"). lending_type_iso2code ISO code lending type (e.g., "XI"). lending_type_name name lending type (e.g., "IDA").

what: wbids: Seamless Access to World Bank International Debt Statistics (IDS) — wbids-package
title: wbids: Seamless Access to World Bank International Debt Statistics (IDS) — wbids-package
text: Access analyze World Bank's International Debt Statistics (IDS) https://www.worldbank.org/en/programs/debt-statistics/ids. IDS provides creditor-debtor relationships countries, regions, institutions. 'wbids' enables users download, process work IDS series across multiple geographies, counterparts, time periods.

title: wbids: Seamless Access to World Bank International Debt Statistics (IDS) — wbids-package
text: Maintainer: Teal Emery lte@tealinsights.com Authors: Christoph Scheuch christoph@tidy-intelligence.com (ORCID) contributors: Teal Insights [copyright holder] Christopher Smith chriscarrollsmith@gmail.com [contributor]

title: wbids 1.1.0
text: CRAN release: 2025-09-04 Rename geographies entities across functions (soft deprecation, breaking change).

title: wbids 1.0.0
text: CRAN release: 2025-02-08 ids_get() Roxygen2 documentation enhancements. ids_get() now makes single consolidated API call series countries rather one call per series-country combination, greatly improving performance. ids_get() now fails informative error message user requests much data. ids_get() now takes start_year end_year rather start_date end_date arguments (breaking change).

title: wbids 1.0.0
text: ids_list_counterparts() now contains counterpart_iso2code countries regions. read_bulk_file() now returns correct column counterpart_id. ids_get() longer returns NAs geographies. ids_get() longer returns wrong counterpart_type rows. ids_get() now removes trailing whitespace correctly encodes special characters. Removed third-party dependency causing tests fail CRAN.

title: wbids 0.1.0
text: CRAN release: 2024-11-15 Initial CRAN submission. Includes download individual series via ids_get(). Use ids_list_*() functions list supported geographies, series, counterparts, respectively. Includes bulk download multiple series via ids_bulk(). Use ids_bulk_files() ids_bulk_series() get information supported files series, respectively.
